Question: Ubestream Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ubestream Inc.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Semantic edge computing chip and device
- AI Text/Voice Customer Service Bot and shopping guide Bot
- QR code ordering and Skip-to-wait seats for internal use
- Intelligent data analysis and visual chart decision-making plan
- AI semantic/voice chip and AICT/AIoT technology
- OMO Smart Digital Store with QR code purchasing
- AI NLP/NLU Solutions with hierarchical menu and semantics dialogue mode
- Customer Service Mode & Expert assistant mode with 24/7 support
- Multi-language and Multi-UI support
- Cloud-to-end digital transformation of AI semantic technology integration solutions
- International recognition and partnerships
- Government official and legislator engagement
